p: Zika virus RNA levels in plasma samples ranged from 6.5 × 10 3 to 1.2 × 10 5 copies/mL in ZIKV-H-infected animals, from 8.3 × 10 3 to 0.8 × 10 5 copies/mL in ZIKV-PR-infected animals, and from 0.3 × 10 3 to 3.7 × 10 5 copies/mL in ZIKV-U-infected animals ( Figure 4A). One female mouse infected with ZIKV-U had undetectable levels of ZIKV RNA in the plasma, and this animal was excluded from further analyzes.
